cross: Masdevallia Pixie Snow Leopard Ã— Masdevallia John Leathers

measurements.description: One attractive flower and one bud on two 36-cm inflorescences; dorsal sepal white, caudae 4.5cm, orange tip; lateral sepals white blushed raspberry pink veined darker, dark pink-red linear markings proximally, straight caudae 3.5cm, orange tips; petals minute, white; lip minute, white tipped gold; column and anther cap white; substance firm; texture matte; caudae length included in sepal length measurement.
